title: "Georgia State Introduces Graduate Certificates in AI Innovation, Disruptive Innovation and Entrepreneurship, and Fintech Innovation"
excerpt: "Georgia State University’s Robinson College of Business will introduce three stand-alone graduate certificates in fall 2020 to address current and emerging market demand for innovation. Credits earned in the certificate programs can potentially be applied to Robinson’s part-time MBA and select master’s degree programs."
